title: Chief Executive - My Blog - In memory of Vice Premier Qian Qichen

time_markers.text: A year or two after Hong Kong's return to China
quotes: A year or two after Hong Kong's return to China, Vice Premier Qian passed by Hong Kong on his way back to Beijing after visiting South Africa.
In March 2003, Vice Premier Qian retired at the advanced age of 75, but he continued to contribute to the country by sharing his valuable diplomatic experiences.
The first one was taken in 1997 while he was delivering a speech at a banquet in Hong Kong.

organizations.name: Chinese Merchandise Emporium Ltd
quotes: A day before the Election, I bought a Hero fountain pen from the Chinese Merchandise Emporium Ltd in Central.

organizations.name: Executive Council
quotes: He gave a talk to some of the Secretaries of Departments, Directors of Bureaux and Non-official Members of the Executive Council in a villa in Stanley.

roles.title: Vice Premier
quotes: while we looked at the problem, from which we can again have a glimpse of the calm character of Vice Premier Qian.

roles.title: Chief Scrutineer
quotes: As Chief Scrutineer, one of my duties was to sign the Chief Scrutineer's report.

roles.title: Non-official Members of the Executive Council
quotes: He gave a talk to some of the Secretaries of Departments, Directors of Bureaux and Non-official Members of the Executive Council in a villa in Stanley.
Whoever contributed to Hong Kong's return to China is a hero.
Whoever contributed to Hong Kong's return to China is a hero.
Vice Premier Qian passed by Hong Kong on his way back to Beijing after visiting South Africa.
Vice Premier Qian passed by Hong Kong on his way back to Beijing after visiting South Africa.
He gave a talk to some of the Secretaries of Departments, Directors of Bureaux and Non-official Members of the Executive Council in a villa in Stanley.
